verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments. A Psalm of Asaph, a Song. In <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%>: His <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
In <S%H8004>Salem<s%> also is his <S%H5520>tabernacle<s%>, And his <S%H4585>dwelling-place<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
There he <S%H7665>brake<s%> the <S%H7565>arrows<s%> of the <S%H7198>bow<s%>; The <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and the <S%H4421>battle<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Glorious <S%H215><s%> art thou and <S%H117>excellent<s%>, From the <S%H2042>mountains<s%> of <S%H2964>prey<s%>.

The <S%H47>stouthearted<s%> are made a <S%H7997>spoil<s%>, They have <S%H5123>slept<s%> their <S%H8142>sleep<s%>; And none of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>might<s%> have <S%H4672>found<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
At thy <S%H1606>rebuke<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Both <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and <S%H5483>horse<s%> are cast into a deep <S%H7290>sleep<s%>.
Thou <S%H3372><s%>, even thou, art to be feared; And who may <S%H5975>stand<s%> in thy <S%H6440>sight<s%> <S%H227>when<s%> once thou art <S%H639>angry<s%>?
Thou didst cause <S%H1779>sentence<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%>, and was <S%H8252>still<s%>,
When <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, To <S%H3467>save<s%> all the <S%H6035>meek<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Surely the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H7611>thee<s%>: The residue of <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shalt thou gird upon <S%H2296>thee<s%>.

Vow <S%H5087><s%>, and <S%H7999>pay<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: Let all that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> him <S%H2986>bring<s%> <S%H7862>presents<s%> unto him that ought to be <S%H4172>feared<s%>.
He will cut <S%H1219>off<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H5057>princes<s%>: He is <S%H3372>terrible<s%> to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
